name: DirectShifts
headline: Helping healthcare workers find their next career opportunity
description: We connect healthcare workers (physicians, advanced practitioners, nurses and allied health workers) to hospitals/clinics/telehealth companies for short/full time job opportunities.

## The modern way to find your next healthcare job
# **Easier, Transparent, & Convenient. **
#### Find the jobs that you want, where you want, and when you want using our robust platform.
[Get Started](https://directshifts.com/<https:/www.directshifts.com/sign-up?utm_source=mkt-website&utm_medium=mkt-home&utm_campaign=mkt-get-started&utm_content=02192025>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5abebcf1b3e0cb4bb9718bba/66daf6e06bdda39c3d23720c_Home_Hero_Image.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5abebcf1b3e0cb4bb9718bba/66e812236c495c3beb870c44_Home_Hero_desk%20360x266.webp)
### A Platform Designed For Ease Of Use
#### Quickly access thousands of job opportunities. DirectShifts makes the hiring process simple and easy to use for both employers and clinicians
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5abebcf1b3e0cb4bb9718bba/66deab3b9578d16ae2341b94_Easier-icon.webp)
### **Easier**
#### Never deal with lengthy, repetitive applications. Explore multiple jobs and receive invitations to apply directly from employers.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5abebcf1b3e0cb4bb9718bba/66deab3c714ae64dc8590ddc_Transparency-icon.webp)
### **Transparent**
#### Clearly see all the important job details in one place.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5abebcf1b3e0cb4bb9718bba/66deab3bf4987e0313939717_Award-icon.webp)
### **Convenient**
#### Our award-winning platform will match you directly to the best-fitting contracts and jobs. Apply and our credentialing team will take care of the paperwork, so you get to work faster!
### Featured Clients & Employers
Our solutions are trusted by [top hospitals and clinics](https://directshifts.com/<https:/www.directshifts.com/client-success?utm_source=mkt-website&utm_medium=mkt-home-page&utm_campaign=mkt-top-hospitals-and-clinics-link>) across the country.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5abebcf1b3e0cb4bb9718bba/66debe257e93855a55ce475f_galelio-logo.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5abebcf1b3e0cb4bb9718bba/66deab3adb004510ad253381_better-help.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5abebcf1b3e0cb4bb9718bba/66deab3b5cef84573e39e38d_contra-costa-logo.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5abebcf1b3e0cb4bb9718bba/66deab3b29328f86446b5e4f_mount-sin.webp)
### Our Partners
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5abebcf1b3e0cb4bb9718bba/6214dfe983467e2f81d686ee_AAPPR-logo.svg)
### Success Stories
#### Helping Our Partners Succeed
Previous
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5b89e7a9012ec36484c5bc80/66debc09c84d7fcfb6988b91_User-img.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5abebcf1b3e0cb4bb9718bba/63bfcf098e38eba9dc40b7cf_colon-icon.png)
Hi Suchi, I really appreciate all your help and guidance throughout the onboarding process especially when it came to apprising me of the required steps to complete along the way.. Thank you for all of your assistance. Your help definitely made the entire process a smooth one. Iam looking forward to working with clients on the Better Help platform! Thank you so much Suchitral!!
[Read More](https://directshifts.com/<#>)
#### Chauncey Chatman
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5b89e7a9012ec36484c5bc80/66debc1711be47c3a647c076_Munirha-alam.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5abebcf1b3e0cb4bb9718bba/63bfcf098e38eba9dc40b7cf_colon-icon.png)
My plate is full as a single mom and owner of private practice. I don't want to work for a company anymore and DirectShifts gives that networking and bridge to some consistent opportunities without having to be in a draining system.
[Read More](https://directshifts.com/<#>)
#### Munirah Alam
Psychotherapist & Ceremonialist
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5b89e7a9012ec36484c5bc80/66debc23bfbc748a19e5e83b_Dr.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5abebcf1b3e0cb4bb9718bba/63bfcf098e38eba9dc40b7cf_colon-icon.png)
Your company has been outstanding to work with. Excellent communication . Nick has been outstanding and has always been very responsive when I reach out to him. Really like what you folks are trying to do in terms of decreasing administrative layers.
[Read More](https://directshifts.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/posts/directshifts_directshifts-communication-feedback-activity-6801516321482780672-KV-u/#nofollow>)
#### Dr Michael Marchiano
Internal Medicine Physician
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5b89e7a9012ec36484c5bc80/6253c2b4924abbb887148937_Marcia-Roy-Madison.jpeg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5abebcf1b3e0cb4bb9718bba/63bfcf098e38eba9dc40b7cf_colon-icon.png)
DirectShifts has made the process of getting a job much shorter and easier. All my documentation was taken care of by Nick and any missing documents were followed up and uploaded by him. I truly appreciate how Nick took the time to follow up on my application and how I could reach out to him with questions via text and email. Overall, DirectShifts has been one of the best companies I've worked with . 
[Read More](https://directshifts.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/posts/directshifts_directshifts-directshiftstestimonials-feedback-activity-6818965046186545152-w2UU/#nofollow>)
#### Marcia Roye-Madison
MSN, APRN FNP-C Founder - Island Beauty, P.C
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5b89e7a9012ec36484c5bc80/66debc4bbe68b8571d90993c_Lois-Nwachukwu.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5abebcf1b3e0cb4bb9718bba/63bfcf098e38eba9dc40b7cf_colon-icon.png)
Thanks to Directshifts, I got a new job within 2 weeks, it was a very quick process! They responded to my application and questions within 48 hours. Definitely one of the most honest and authentic companies I've worked with. I can always rely on DirectShifts, to notify me of any new job that match my preferences. I appreciated the personal attention from Dylan. He is very respectful and open So far so good!
[Read More](https://directshifts.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/posts/directshifts_directshifts-testimonials-directshiftstestimonials-activity-6816824123256254465-Vz_U/#nofollow>)
#### Lois Nwachukwu
MSN FNP-C
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5b89e7a9012ec36484c5bc80/66debc09c84d7fcfb6988b91_User-img.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5abebcf1b3e0cb4bb9718bba/63bfcf098e38eba9dc40b7cf_colon-icon.png)
I found a job very quickly. I replied to a job match email and was speaking with my company the next week. Perfect!
[Read More](https://directshifts.com/<#>)
#### R. Olivias
Nurse Practitioner
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5b89e7a9012ec36484c5bc80/66debc6875c8cb7a64d11331_susie-headshot_3_11zon.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5abebcf1b3e0cb4bb9718bba/63bfcf098e38eba9dc40b7cf_colon-icon.png)
Jimmy has been responsive, and gracious. and importantly, he's been grateful. ‍As providers, we're somethimes not appreciated for the work we do. I recognized his appreciation and gratitude. his flexibility with my work and what i'm lokking for has been amazing.‍Directshifts' in -house therapist, colleen, has also been amazing and so quick to respond! if i text her, she asks to call me back to answer me in detail.
[Read More](https://directshifts.com/<#>)
#### Susie Harrmann
MSW, LCSW, LCAC
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5b89e7a9012ec36484c5bc80/66debc09c84d7fcfb6988b91_User-img.webp)

MD - Psychiatrist

## The modern way to find your next healthcare job
# **Easier, Transparent, & Convenient. **
#### Find the jobs that you want, where you want, and when you want using our robust platform.
Get Started⟨45⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5abebcf1b3e0cb4bb9718bba/66daf6e06bdda39c3d23720c_Home_Hero_Image.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5abebcf1b3e0cb4bb9718bba/66e812236c495c3beb870c44_Home_Hero_desk%20360x266.webp)
### A Platform Designed For Ease Of Use
#### Quickly access thousands of job opportunities. DirectShifts makes the hiring process simple and easy to use for both employers and clinicians
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5abebcf1b3e0cb4bb9718bba/66deab3b9578d16ae2341b94_Easier-icon.webp)
### **Easier**
#### Never deal with lengthy, repetitive applications. Explore multiple jobs and receive invitations to apply directly from employers.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5abebcf1b3e0cb4bb9718bba/66deab3c714ae64dc8590ddc_Transparency-icon.webp)
### **Transparent**
#### Clearly see all the important job details in one place.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5abebcf1b3e0cb4bb9718bba/66deab3bf4987e0313939717_Award-icon.webp)
### **Convenient**
#### Our award-winning platform will match you directly to the best-fitting contracts and jobs. Apply and our credentialing team will take care of the paperwork, so you get to work faster!
### Featured Clients & Employers
Our solutions are trusted by top hospitals and clinics⟨46⟩ across the country.

generated_description:
### DirectShifts: Connecting Healthcare Workers with Opportunities

**Overview**  
DirectShifts is a New York-based company founded back in 2017, with a clear mission: to help healthcare professionals find their next career opportunity. It began by connecting healthcare workers—like physicians, advanced practitioners, nurses, and allied health providers—with hospitals and clinics seeking full-time or temporary staff. The service has evolved into a robust platform that simplifies the recruitment process, focusing on the immediate needs of both clinicians and healthcare institutions.

**Key Details**  
- **Founding Year:** 2017  
- **Team Size:** 72 employees  
- **Connection to Y Combinator:** Part of Batch S19, showcasing a solid startup pedigree.  
- **Group Partner:** Michael Seibel, a notable figure in the startup world.  

**What They Do**  
DirectShifts operates primarily in the recruiting and healthcare sectors, creating a user-friendly platform that allows users to easily access thousands of job listings. Clinicians can explore positions without the hassles of repetitive applications, thereby gaining direct access to job offers from employers.  

Among their offerings are roles for:
- Physicians  
- Registered Nurses  
- Nurse Practitioners  
- Physician Assistants  
- Behavioral Health Specialists  
- CRNAs (Certified Registered Nurse Anesthetists)  
- Technologists and more.

**Why Choose DirectShifts?**  
The company emphasizes three core efficiencies:
- **Ease of Use:** Clinicians can browse jobs and receive invitations to apply without tedious application processes.
- **Transparency:** Job seekers can view all important details about positions in one place.
- **Convenience:** Their platform handles the paperwork involved in job applications, allowing healthcare workers to focus on what matters—patient care.

**Feedback & Community Impact**  
DirectShifts has received positive testimonials from various healthcare professionals who appreciate the streamlined process and the genuine support from the DirectShifts team. The platform not only helps users find jobs but also fosters a community where healthcare workers can network and share their experiences.

**Where to Find Them**  
Curious about job opportunities? Check out the [DirectShifts website](https://directshifts.com) for open positions or to learn more about becoming part of their clinician community.

In conclusion, DirectShifts represents a modern solution to the healthcare staffing challenge, built for the ease of both providers and employers. If you're in healthcare and looking for your next opportunity or to bolster your workforce, this might just be the platform you need to explore!
